Package adventure_game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
adventure_game.Character
adventure_game.Player
public class Player extends Character
Constructs a new Player object with the given name, health, mana, and base damage. The class Player represents a specific type of character in the game. It extends the abstract class Character and implements the takeTurn() method to allow the player to select their actions during combat. The Player class also includes a constructor for creating a new player, as well as methods for using items and checking if the player has any items.

    • takeTurn

      public void takeTurn(Character owner, Character other, Scanner scanner)
      Determines the player's action during their turn in combat. The player may attack, defend, or use an item if they have any available. If the player is stunned, they will be unable to take any action and will lose their turn.
      Parameters:
      other - The opposing character in the combat.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Character owner, Character other, Scanner scanner)
      Allow the character to use an item from their inventory. The method prompts the user to select an item from the character's inventory and uses the item on either the owner or another target character. The used item is removed from the inventory after use.
      Overrides:
      useItem in class Character
      Parameters:
      owner - The character using the item.
      other - The target character that the item will affect.
      scanner - A scanner to collect user input.
